system.description:
Prerequisites

Pow +1, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.7mVBPbMawQ47bTbY]{Brutal Throw}

Benefits

On the character’s turn, before making any attacks, the character may choose to take a penalty on all thrown weapon attack rolls and add the same number as a bonus to all thrown weapon damage rolls. This number may not exceed the character’s BAB. The penalty on attacks and bonus on damage applies until the character’s next turn.
system.summary: Spend BAB for damage on throws
